data.title: Early A Round Saturate Peek
data.description: Early into the round, throw your Saturate for a favorable fight towards A Main. This gives you time to use Light Speed as well, if you choose to coordinate utility with a teammate.

data.title: Market Entrance Saturate
data.description: At the beginning of the round, throw your Saturate as shown in the video to prevent Attackers from seeking Mid control easily. It is recommended to request a Window smoke from your teammate.
